resources.string:
"Welcome to StudyZone!" "

StudyZone brings you the perfectly fitting platform to map" "your study to-do's in an instant. StudyZone provides four" "main features to benefit your academic lifestyle.


" "TO-DO LIST" "

The To-Do List will help you keep track of" "all your activities while assuring that you complete each" "task before their due dates!" "


MUSIC-STUDY PLAYLIST" "

StudyZone incorporates this Music-Study feature for you rockin'" "studiers who achieve more with the power of music! We encourage" "you to link your Spotify account, but if you don't have one," "we have pre-loaded playlists you can select from to satisfy your" "senses. Jam on!" "

REMINDERS" "

Reminders are essential in urging you to success! Set reminders" "to remind yourself of your upcoming exams, quizzes or homework due" "dates. You can also set a reminder to study in your free time - which" "you can set up yourself within the StudyZone app!" "

STATISTICS" "

StudyZone feels its important for you to obtain feedback from us according" "to your performances per assignment and the amount of time you took to study for them." "This feedback will lead to you optimizing your time very well, ensuring you are the" "best student you can be!"
